You can also watch the discussion on COVID, Year 3 here: https://t.co/9My2qRO149 https://t.co/spAXDs9Lzx https://t.co/Ajmbmz391X

I'll Never Give My Kid the Covid-19 Shot!
- That's your choice. I understand parents are always trying to do the best they can for their kids. I encourage you to discuss the data -- when available -- with a trusted doctor & make the risk/benefit assessment together.

...I'm not saying that vaccines can't have rare side effects, including serious ones. But this is why the FDA has such a tricky job to weigh the overall risk/benefit - and we DO know that COVID can have serious outcomes for kids <5 as well...

Covid Vaccines Give Kids Long Term Side Effects!
- We literally have no kids who've had the vaccine for a long time, so I don't know how one could say this. I will say that the bar for safety for kids is higher than for adults, and this will be closely tracked...

NEW: There's been a lot of confusion and misinformation about Covid vaccines for kids under 5. I hope this story brings some clarity and is helpful to parents. 

https://t.co/foU4E9lFIp
